alert.note: Alert for Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 23 at 1:41AM MST until November 24 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM EARLY THIS MORNING TO 11 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. Locally higher accumulations around Kaycee and in the southern part of the County. * WHERE...Lower elevations of Johnson County. * WHEN...From 5 AM Thursday to 11 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult along both I-25 and I- 90 due to the combination of snow and wind. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow and strongest wind is likely to occur from late Thanksgiving morning through the evening.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County
